appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: This plugin allows you to automatically solve CAPTCHAs found on any webpage.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

whatSolveTabButtonTitle.message: Switch to What to solve tab

recaptchaTabButtonTitle.message: Switch to a Recaptcha advanced tab

accountKeyTitle.message: Enter your Anti-Captcha.com account key.

accountKeyTitleTitle.message: Enter your Anti-Captcha.com account key here

noAccountKey.message: Why do I need the key?

noAccountKeyInfo.message:
This plugin requires a special key to get the job done.
You need to register on Anti-Captcha.com.
Then add funds and place here the key you can find in "Settings" -> "API setup" section of the website.

noAccountKeyCloseTitle.message: Close the "Why do I need the key" window

autoSubmitFormInfo.message:
Sends captcha solution to the target website for verification when it's solved.
This functional may work incorrect on certain websites. Uncheck it if a webpage reloads after solving.

useRecaptchaAcceleratorInfo.message:
This feature allows you to let us solve the Recaptcha2 faster by providing minor HTML data that surrounds a Recaptcha block.
By using this HTML data (on an anti-captcha.com side) we can fool a Recaptcha2 so it thinks that it's being solved on an actual web site.
No important data is sent, no input values, not a complete HTML. Only cropped code that includes .g-recaptcha element subtree.
For example: <body><main class='main'><form action='/sendForm'><input type='text' name='somename'><div class='g-recaptcha'></div></form></main></body>
All the attributes except id, class, role, type, name, method, action are stripped.
Please be patient, we are still working on this features but we belive it's gonna save you time and so money!

useRecaptchaPrecachingInfo.message: New feature allows you to reduce Recaptcha solving time twice or even more, depending on your usage regime. Recaptcha precache debug page

precachingKNumberInfo.message: The number of extra not occupied tasks for precaching. Automatic algorithm adjusts the number between min and max for a better performance and less spending. Recommended: Min=2, Max=4.

precachingKNumberMinTitle.message: Please specify the min value of K-number range

precachingKNumberMaxTitle.message: Please specify the max value of K-number range

solveRecaptcha2.message: Solve reCAPTCHA 2 (I'm not a robot) automatically

solveRecaptcha2Info.message: You may turn off this option if you don't need a reCAPTCHA 2 being solved when it's found on a web page. Regular image CAPTCHA will work as usual.

solveRecaptcha3Info.message: Turn off this option if you don't want to solve new reCAPTCHA 3.

recaptcha3DesiredScoreTitle.message: Please enter the Recaptcha 3 score you would like to have

solveInvisibleRecaptcha2Title.message: Turn On/Off invisibile reCAPTCHA automatic solving

solveInvisibleRecaptcha2Info.message: Solve a reCAPTCHA that looks like a small badge that's usually in a right bottom corner of the web page.

dontReuseRecaptchaSolutionTitle.message: Turn Off/On previous reCAPTCHA 2 solution reusage

dontReuseRecaptchaSolution.message: Don't reuse previous reCAPTCHA 2 solution on the same page

dontReuseRecaptchaSolutionInfo.message: A new recaptcha solving process will start for a newly appeared recaptcha box even if there is another reCAPTCHA 2 recently solved (and not yet expired) on this web-page. If off then new solving process will start only after previous solution (on the same web-page) expires.

whereSolveWhiteList.message: Where to solve captchas domain list

whereSolveBlackList.message: Where NOT to solve captchas domain list

whereSolveList.message: Where to solve/not to solve domains list

whereSolveHostnameTitle.message: Enter the domain you want to add to the list

whereSolveAttention.message: Attention: White list is empty, no captcha will be solved on any domain.

solveFuncaptchaInfo.message: Turn on if you want Funcaptcha being automatically solved.

solveGeetestInfo.message: Turn on if you want Geetest being automatically solved.

solveHcaptchaInfo.message: Turn on if you want hCaptcha being automatically solved.

setIncomingWorkersUserAgentTitle.message: Turn On/Off incoming worker's User-Agent setting

setIncomingWorkersUserAgentInfo.message: For certain types of captchas (hCaptcha e.g.) with a solution itself we also got a User-Agent of the worker. If option is ON then we replace your browser's User-Agent with that value for a short period of time (110 sec) and for a current tab only. So your browser matches the browser where captcha was initially solved. This improves successful captcha solving ratio.

runExplicitInvisibleHcaptchaCallbackWhen.message: Turn On/Off callback running when a challenge box is shown mode for explicit invisible Hcaptcha
Run explicit invisible Hcaptcha callback only when the challenge is shown

An invisible Hcaptcha will be considered as solved only when the corresponding button is pressed or Hcaptcha execute method called. In this case only when the challenge box is shown the target website callback will be executed.
It's a new behavior for plugin. So if you are facing some issues with Invisible Hcaptcha, try to disable this checkbox.

startRecaptcha2SolvingWhenChallengeShown.message: Turn On/Off solving when a challenge box is shown mode
Start reCAPTCHA 2 solving only when a challenge box is shown
A solving process will start only when a reCAPTCHA challenge box with images and stuff is shown. Useful for invisible reCAPTCHA 2: gonna save you some money and will prevent unnecessary callbacks.

solveOnlyPresentedRecaptcha2Title.message: Do not solve hidden on a web-page reCAPTCHA 2

solveOnlyPresentedRecaptcha2.message: Solve only presented (not hidden) on a web-page reCAPTCHA 2

solveOnlyPresentedRecaptcha2Info.message: If it's ON it will only solve a reCAPTCHA 2 that is actually visible on a web-page. A reCAPTCHA 2 located in an invisible or hidden container won't be solved.

usePredefinedImageCaptchaMarksTitle.message: Turn On/Off automatic image CAPTCHA selection and solution

usePredefinedImageCaptchaMarks.message: Use predefined regular image CAPTCHA marks

usePredefinedImageCaptchaMarksInfo.message: Regular image CAPTCHA will be automatically found, marked and solved on every web page. It's based on selection of other users, but all your local marks will have priority anyway.

reenableContextmenuTitle.message: Force browser to show context menu

reenableContextmenuInfo.message: Check if target website disables context menu and you can't mark image and input as CAPTCHA. This feature affects websites which use their own context menu and/or block original.

proxyOnTasksInfo.message:
All the captcha tasks (except regular image captchas) will be solved through the proxy you set up below as ProxyOn.
This might be required if the target website checks the solver IP address. In that case this proxy will be sent together with a ProxyOn task to the anti-captcha.com. Also you need to use this proxy in an extension like Proxy SwitchyOmega, so your browser IP address and the solver IP address matches.

proxyOnTasksQuickAddSwitchTitle.message: Switch between quick and normal proxy adding modes

proxyOnTasksQuickAddInputTitle.message: Enter proxy settings line according to the input mask

playSoundsInfo.message: The Plugin plays sound when CAPTCHA found, while solving process and in case of success or error.

delayOnreadyCallbackTitle.message: Call a captcha onReady callback only when it's already solved

delayOnreadyCallbackInfo.message:
Useful for cases when target website gives only a small time gap to solve captcha, i.e. on rollercoin.com.
If this checkbox is on then captcha being solved before target website knows that it was initiated, so its timer do not start.
Works only for Geetest captcha at the moment.

leaveFeedbackTitle.message: Leave feedback or report a problem about our extension

getAntiCaptchaKey.message: Get Anti-Captcha.com key.

getFreeAttempts.message: You can get $captchas_count$ free captchas if you authorise in your Google account in this browser

newVersionCrxAutoupdate.message: Plugin will be automatically updated to the newest version.

newVersionZipDownloadLink.message: New version $new_version$ of the plug-in available for downloading.

markInputTitle.message: Mark input as captcha solution destination (CTRL+SHIFT+3)

unmarkImageTitle.message: Unmark image as captcha source when you press here

unmarkInputTitle.message: Unmark input as captcha solution destination when you press here

agingRecaptchaTitle.message: Captcha solution will be expired in %s seconds.

imageAutosearchTitle.message: Find and solve CAPTCHA image for this input (CTRL+SHIFT+6)
